nodes.title: Restauratori – Educational mobile application game
nodes.content:
Restauratori is educational hidden object game where players need to seek objects that doesn’t actually exist in artist artwork.

The game has a level and scoring system. A huge effort has been put into this project as there were a lot of workshops with the customer to understand the full project scope and challenge to meet the deadlines as it was one of the customer requirements to stick into the tight time schedule.
